name: Jkhfilesearch
tagline: My Open Source replacement for Agent Ransack and Windows File Search
body:
Most of the time the built-in Windows file search is slow and doesn't find the files I am looking for.

I used to use the free version of [Agent Ransack](https://www.mythicsoft.com/agentransack) but there were a couple of annoying "features" so I decided to write my own.

It has Windows Explorer Right-Click context, so you can right click a folder in Explorer and bring up a file search:

![Right Click Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jeoffman/jkhFileSearch/master/Resources/JkhSearchRightClickScreenshot.png?raw=true)

And here is a screenshot:

![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jeoffman/jkhFileSearch/master/Resources/JkhFileSearchScreenshot.png?raw=true)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
